name: Dheeraj Maheshwari
top_product: Our Brand Story Video & TV Commercial Package is our top product. This comprehensive solution helps businesses clearly articulate their unique value proposition and reach a wider audience. It includes a compelling corporate brand video for online platforms and a professionally produced TV commercial for broad broadcast reach.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a Marketing Head or Business Owner at a mid-sized company (B2B or B2C) who recognizes the power of video but currently lacks a consistent, high-quality video content strategy. They are looking for a reliable partner in Ahmedabad, India to produce engaging marketing videos or a memorable TV advertisement to boost their brand's visibility and drive sales.
top_problem_solved: We solve the problem of ineffective or inconsistent brand communication through video. Many businesses struggle to convey their message powerfully, leading to missed opportunities and wasted marketing spend. Morphic Studio transforms complex ideas into clear, engaging, and action-oriented video content that truly resonates with their target audience, helping them stand out in a crowded market.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story highlights the power of Givers Gain right within our chapter! I have the privilege of producing the Maximus Premier League (MPL) videos for our BNI chapter. This consistent contribution not only boosts the visibility of our chapter members and educates them on key BNI principles, but it also directly showcases Morphic Studio's video production capabilities week after week. This engagement has genuinely generated business and increased my visibility within the chapter, leading to fantastic referrals and strengthening my relationships with fellow members. It's a clear demonstration of how giving truly comes back to you!

my_business:
We are into paints manufacturing since 1977. The Manufacturing is based in Ahmadabad, and at present we have paint dealer and Industrial Customers network of more than 5000 customers. We have marketing setup in 22 states with more than 50 branches, agents and distributors.
The current monthly production of plant is more than 300 tons per month. And we have expandable capacity up to 2000 tons per month.
We make more than 200 different products excluding shades. Our main focus area of working in paint industry is;
- Wood Coating & Protective Coatings
- Automotive Refinish, OEM & Ancillaries Coatings
- Industrial & Infrastructure Coatings
- Packaging Coatings [Can, Drums & Barrels]
- Electrical Insulation & Transformer Coating
- Construction Chemicals & Waterproofing
- Glass & Metal Coatings
- Hi Performance Coatings & functional Coatings
